# PATCH /v1/reviewSubmissionItems/{id} | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ PATCH /v1/reviewSubmissionItems/{id} ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-reviewSubmissionItems-_id_)

-  PATCH /v1/reviewSubmissionItems/{id} 

Web Service Endpoint# PATCH /v1/reviewSubmissionItems/{id}

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-reviewSubmissionItems-_id_#url)



```
PATCH https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/reviewSubmissionItems/{id}
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-reviewSubmissionItems-_id_#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)

`[ReviewSubmissionItemUpdateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/reviewsubmissionitemupdaterequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-reviewSubmissionItems-_id_#response-codes)
